title: Mowgli: Legend of the Jungle
short_cast: Christian Bale, Cate Blanchett, Benedict Cumberbatch, Naomie Harris, Andy Serkis, Rohan Chand, Peter Mullan, Jack Reynor, Eddie Marsan, Tom Hollander, Louis Ashbourne Serkis, Matthew Rhys, Freida Pinto
